1371: Alard was born in Cromme straet in 1371.
1375: Lost sibling Amalburga in 1375 when Amalburga was 4.
1379: Lost mother at the age of 8.
Lost mother at the age of 8.
Engelbertus took care of Alard since Alard was 9.
1393: Got married to Diewiven at age 23 in 1393.

1394: Lost sibling Wolcout in 1394 when Wolcout was 22.
1395: Lost father at the age of 24.
1397: Had a daughter with Diewiven, Diewiven, at age 26.
1398: Lost his wife Diewiven while she was giving birth to Snelgerus in 1398.

1399: Got married a second time to Hodine at age 29 in 1399.
